alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 3:10PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL CASS AND WEST CENTRAL CROW WING COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM CDT... At 310 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gull Lake, or near Brainerd, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Merrifield around 330 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Nisswa and Pequot Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
